title: 'Great Product but...'
body: Its a great product. Although I had to exchange it once because it had one stain on the outside, and the one i got exchanged was torn at back from inside (it wasn't torn but its stiching was loose). I got it stitched perfectly. And it looks really good. But I found some resistance in the mobility in shoulder area, but that didn't matter after all its a formal clothing.
